name: Officer O'Brian
descriptions: Officer O'Brian is a member of Vault 101 security in Fallout 3. He is guarding the locked atrium door to the Vault 101 entrance together with Officer Richards.

A vicious sadist under the command of Vault 101 overseer Alphonse Almodovar, O'Brian basks in the ability to inflict pain on other Vault dwellers. The confusion and chaos accompanying James' escape is a boon to him, as it makes it easy for him to indulge his violent side with impunity.
